channel.title: Pre-EOC Servers
channel.description: Since Jagex is going to (mosy likely) release an 07' server the market for that type of server is saturated and now dead. We need a new market to work from. There seems to br a large group of players who enjoy post 07' up to before EOC. I think thats the point where people should invest their develipmenta into now. Especially if you want to get big.

item.title: Pre-EOC Servers
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I’m into good graphics and not really a fan of pre-HD, even though I played before they started using HD. I don’t know why, but I like how the 508/525 servers looked (with HD and the Grand Exchange). I have not really seen any 508/525 servers (that aren’t leech to all hell) lately, I could be mistaken, but I don’t look at top server lists like on RuneLocus that much.

Read full topic

item.title: Pre-EOC Servers
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Since Jagex is going to (mosy likely) release an 07’ server the market for that type of server is saturated and now dead. We need a new market to work from. There seems to br a large group of players who enjoy post 07’ up to before EOC. I think thats the point where people should invest their develipmenta into now. Especially if you want to get big.
